tags.name: ue-details
tags.description: Details show a brief summary and expand to show additional content..

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Copy for the read the docs hint.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the details so it can’t be toggled.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.description: The summary to show in the header. If you need to display HTML, use the summary slot instead.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Copy for the read the docs hint.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables the details so it can’t be toggled.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: The summary to show in the header. If you need to display HTML, use the summary slot instead.

events.name: ue-after-show
events.description: Emitted after the details opens and all animations are complete.

events.name: ue-after-hide
events.description: Emitted after the details closes and all animations are complete.

slots.name: summary
slots.description: The details' summary. Alternatively, you can use the `summary` attribute.

cssParts.name: summary
cssParts.description: The header that wraps both the summary and the expand/collapse icon.
